string.text: performing new rituals that treat the ruler as semi-divine
{VALUE}% damage bonus from speed with polearms by troops in your formation.
{WOUNDED_NUMBER} of your men got wounded while they were trying to separate the two sides.
{VALUE}% handling of swingable polearms.
You are a wanted criminal.
You have tried to persuade me before. I will not stand your words again.
Village is successfully raided by your help.
{TOURNAMENT_ROUND_GOAL}{QUEST_GIVER.LINK} will certainly be disappointed.
a flagon of ale
a plate of herrings
Go on...

Yes, there's a lot of work we need to do around the village, [ib:demure][if:convo_dismayed]and we're short on the materials that our smith needs to make us tools and fittings. Do you think you could get us some? We'll pay well.
{VALUE}% fortification bonus to the governed settlement
Your family were small farmers with just enough land to feed themselves and make a small profit. People like them were the pillars of the imperial rural economy, as well as the backbone of the levy.
{VALUE} daily experience to infantry in your party.
{VALUE}% reload speed to mangonels and trebuchets in siege bombardment.
{VALUE} companion limit.
Make peace with the {KINGDOM_NAME}. No tribute will be paid.
{FIRSTNAME} the Lizard
A permanent space that hosts fairs. Citizens can gather, drink dance and socialize, increasing the daily morale of the settlement.
{LORD.NAME} is a member of the {CLAN_NAME}, {CLAN_DESCRIPTION} of the {FACTION_NAME} that is backing {RULER} in the civil war. {?LORD.GENDER}She{?}He{\?} has the reputation of being {REPUTATION}.
You may know me as a {?PLAYER.GENDER}woman{?}man{\?} of honor.
Yes, {?PLAYER.GENDER}madam{?}sir{\?}. Thank you.
{VALUE}% damage with bows by troops in your formation.
Mounted weapon damage penalty: {a0}%
You are commanding the besiegers.
This is a dangerous step, however, and I'm putting my life and the lives of my people at risk. I need some sort of support from you before I can change my allegiance.[if:convo_stern]
I have no answer to that.
As {?IS_FEMALE}queen{?}king{\?} you must decide whether to enforce the policy of {POLICY_NAME}.
Very good. Keep them coming.[if:convo_mocking_aristocratic]
You can not help but notice how people are put at ease by {?PLAYER_CHILD}your {?CHILD.GENDER}daughter{?}son{\?}{?}the {?CHILD.GENDER}girl{?}boy{\?}{\?} and seek {?CHILD.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} company.
You cannot devastate a settlement that has your faction culture.{newline}
Workshop Income
I am thinking of a different attribute.
{ARMY_OWNER_TEXT} {ARMY_BEHAVIOR}
Your relation with notables in some of your settlements increased due to high loyalty
taxing landowners on their property

Or, maybe one of your trusted companions can buy the {ITEM_TYPE}. I reckon they'll cost {COMPANION_NEED_GOLD_AMOUNT}{GOLD_ICON} denars[if:convo_bored], and they'd best take at least {ALTERNATIVE_TROOP_AMOUNT} men for protection.
{VALUE} bow skill to horse archers in your formation
{VALUE} daily experience to infantry troops in your party.
A gang leader needs recruits for {?ISSUE_GIVER.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} gang.

Sedition? You have been misinformed. [if:convo_normal][ib:hip]My men and I are loyal servants of {RULER_NAME_AND_TITLE}. We are simply going about informing the people that our {RULER_TITLE} is surrounded by bad advisers who wish to raise their taxes. We petition {RULER.NAME} to listen to {?RULER.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} people and their needs.[ib:closed]
Surely you know that {FIRST_NAME} is {RELATIONSHIP} as well as my liege, and will always be able to count on my loyalty.
{VALUE} combat skill to troops in your formation.
Hunting Rights
{?CHARACTER.GENDER}She{?}He{\?} retired from adventuring, and was last seen with a group of mountain hermits living a life of quiet contemplation.
I must say something. Your men say their wages are late. We should take care that this doesn't happen.
{RULER.NAME} of the {KINGDOM} grants {SETTLEMENT} to {LEADER.NAME} with {?RULER.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} council's support.
Reject the landlord's request for money and collect revenues as before.
I'll accept that.
{VALUE}% troops left behind when escaping from battles.
Walk It Off
a plate of mutton dumplings
Tenants are forbidden from leaving the lands of their lords without notice.
I'll be waiting. Good luck.[if:convo_relaxed_happy][ib:confident]
No effect

Your father was a bailiff for a local feudal magnate. He looked after his liege's estates, resolved disputes in the village, and helped train the village levy. He rode with the lord's cavalry, fighting as an armored knight.
{VALUE}% casualty chance from siege bombardments.
We await your success,[if:convo_nervous] {?PLAYER.GENDER}milady{?}sir{\?}.
I recently bought the right to graze cattle near the village of {TARGET_SETTLEMENT}.[if:convo_thinking][ib:closed] Good pastureland is hard to find. But now the locals are giving my herdsmen trouble.
Very well, then...
Attack army
Sturgia Snow Bonus
Abandon Army
{VALUE}% reload speed with bows.
At the same time, {?CHILD.GENDER}she{?}he{\?} shows {?PLAYER_IS_MOTHER}your{?}{?CHILD.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} mother's{\?}....
Caravan entered {SETTLEMENT_LINK}.
Wall Breaker
I'm afraid I don't have time to fight but I can use my influence.
Armies led by Tier 5+ nobles require 10% less influence{newline}Influence of the ruler clan is reduced by 1 per day
The noble did not let {CHILD.NAME} go hand-to-hand with other warriors, but the young {?CHILD.GENDER}woman{?}man{\?} joined the archers as they traded shots with enemy scouts.
Forest Kin
I'll bring your {?MOUNT_TYPE_IS_CAMEL}camels{?}horses{\?} by myself.
Your clan is now owner of the town from which the goods were stolen. As the lord of the settlement you cannot get involved in deals of this kind. Your agreement with {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} is canceled.
{VALUE}% recovery of lost hit points after each battle.
You were unable to drive the herders from the disputed pasture. The landowner, {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}, probably feels that you let {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}her{?}him{\?} down.
Take too much time, and my men will swing from the gallows. Speed it along, will you?
Public Speaker
You will end the siege if you leave. Are you sure?
{PEACEMAKER_RULER.NAME} of the {KINGDOM_CONSIDERING_PEACE} has decided to make peace with the {KINGDOM} with the support of {?PEACEMAKER_RULER.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} council.
Polearm weapon damage: +{a0}%
Not yet, but I will soon.
Hmm.. No... {IMMEDIATE_FAILURE_LINE}
There are no nobles to meet.
Your contract with the {QUEST_GIVER.NAME} is still in force. I can't let you go without {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} permission.
The {ENEMY_KINGDOM_INFORMAL_NAME} may be strong but their lands are rich and ripe for the taking.
Thank you. Your service will be remembered.
As {?IS_FEMALE}queen{?}king{\?} you must decide whether to disavow the policy of {POLICY_NAME}.
We should award this fief to a new clan
{VALUE}% armor while on foot.
defeats an enemy.
Wind Winder
Pay {FINE}{INFLUENCE_ICON}
{VALUE}% learning rate of new part designs when smelting.
I just hope you can deliver the herd soon.
shooting at targets.
Urban troops spend much of their time guarding the town walls. Most of their training was in missile weapons.
Discarded armors are donated to troops for increased experience.

Ah, yes. I am afraid I can no longer entertain such a proposal. I am now the head of my family, and the factors that we must consider have changed. You would need to place your property under my control, and I do not think that you would accept that.

All profitable trade routes of the caravan are blocked by recent wars. {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} decided to recall the caravan until the situation gets better. {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}She{?}He{\?} was happy with your service and sent you {REWARD}{GOLD_ICON} as promised.
{VALUE}% garrison wages in the governed castle.
My deals are none of your business, merchant.
What I mentioned about running from battle...
{FIRSTNAME} of the Staff
Scout the keep
You are my prisoners now.
{VALUE}% mounted melee damage.

Deliver the prisoner to {ISSUE_OWNER.LINK} {?ISSUE_OWNER.GENDER}herself{?}himself{\?} or one of {?ISSUE_OWNER.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} settlements. If you don't want to deliver {TARGET_HERO.LINK}, talk with {?TARGET_HERO.GENDER}her{?}him{\?} to negotiate on {?TARGET_HERO.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} release.
Here are some documents from the chancellery.
You are not in command of this siege.
But I'm sure you won't disappoint me.[ib:confident] Enjoy your riches![if:convo_focused_happy][ib:demure]
Have you found any good men?[ib:confident3]

Not everyone who musters for the levy marches to war, and not everyone who goes on campaign sees action. You did both, and you also took down an enemy warrior in direct one-to-one combat, in the full view of your comrades.
Carry on, then. Farewell.
{VALUE}% chance per day to increase relation with a notable by 1 when you enter a town.
Your tutor throws up his hands in the air at {CHILD.NAME}'s ability to lie {?CHILD.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} way out of trouble, but can't help but admire it a little.
Oh, thank you {PLAYER.NAME}.[if:convo_merry] You will always be remembered by our people. Farewell.
{VALUE} ammunition for throwing weapons to troops in your party.

I have a mine near here. We had an unfortunate accident a week back. [if:convo_thinking][ib:hip]Two workers were crushed to death. It's a great shame... but work must go on. Trouble is, no one wants to come back. If perhaps you could find me some prisoners...
Yes, they are here. Tell your men to come pick them up.
participate in a pilgrimage.
I brought {AMOUNT_TO_DELIVER} {.%}{?AMOUNT_TO_DELIVER > 1}{PLURAL(REQUESTED_GOOD)}{?}{REQUESTED_GOOD}{\?}{.%} as we agreed.
{QUEST_GIVER.LINK} has lost {SETTLEMENT} and your agreement with {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}her{?}him{\?} has been canceled.

The noble gave the young adult command of a small group of scouts. {?CHILD.GENDER}She{?}He{\?} took them on patrol and even though some were twice {?CHILD.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} age, {?CHILD.GENDER}she{?}he{\?} won their respect.

{QUEST_GIVER.LINK}: Thank you. My lords see the conquest of {TARGET_SETTLEMENT} was a stepping stone toward further victories. {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}She{?}He{\?} is grateful for your service. Because you didn't lead the army {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}She{?}He{\?} gave you {LESSER_REWARD}{GOLD_ICON} of denars.
This is for {COMPANION.NAME}
Trick knife throws and swift evasions can entertain a marketplace crowd, but are useful on the battlefield as well.
Marriage Offer
{VALUE}% damage bonus from speed with two handed weapons while on foot.
My liege {QUEST_GIVER.NAME} also instructed me to present you the sum of {REWARD_GOLD}{GOLD_ICON} denars for the prisoners exchange.
Party Type:
You have failed to pay {TOTAL_DENAR}{GOLD_ICON} denars to {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}. {QUEST_GIVER_VILLAGE} and its locals are aware of your misdemeanor.
Have you made your trip yet? I presume you were able to make a sale?
{VALUE}% movement speed to infantry in your formation.
Towns owned by Battanian rulers have +1 militia production.
The {HOSTILE_FACTION} and {SETTLEMENT_FACTION} are no longer enemies.
{QUEST_GIVER.LINK} is not avaliable for this quest anymore.
I'll help if I can.
Sorry. I don't have any animals for you this time.
Excellent... I'm counting on you! The caravan will be leaving soon.[if:convo_normal][ib:hip]

The gang leaders who kept watch over the slums of Calradian cities were always in need of poor youth to run messages and back them up in turf wars, while thrill-seeking merchants' sons and daughters sometimes slummed it in their company as well.
{FIRSTNAME} the Boulder
Target settlement is under attack right now.
You can not parley during an ongoing battle.
You don't have {BRIBE_COST} denars.
A courier bearing a peace offer from the {PROPOSER_HERO_FACTION} has arrived at the court of your realm.
Fah...I don't need more men. Thank you.
It was a pleasure to work with you, chief. Farewell...[if:convo_nonchalant][ib:normal2]
The caravan got lost and it was {CHILD.NAME} who spotted the landmarks that got it back on track.
Honor represents your reputation for respecting your formal commitments, like keeping your word and obeying the law.
{QUEST_GIVER.NAME} won’t need anymore daggers. You can go back to {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}her{?}him{\?} to get your reward.
He'll be delighted. I'll tell him to join you as soon as possible.

{ISSUE_GIVER.LINK} told you that {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} local smith needs {REQUESTED_ITEM} to forge more tools. You asked your companion {COMPANION.LINK} to help the local smith and craft {REQUESTED_ITEM_COUNT} {?(REQUESTED_ITEM_COUNT > 1)}{PLURAL(REQUESTED_ITEM)}{?}{REQUESTED_ITEM}{\?} for the village. Your companion will rejoin your party in {RETURN_DAYS} days.
granting villagers the right to graze on land held in common
You declared that the village had paid enough, and departed.
{VALUE}% recovery rate for each type of food in party inventory.
Mounted Patrols
{VALUE}% visual range on the campaign map.
The market isn't what we expected. I am afraid I only made {GATHERED_DENARS}{GOLD_ICON} of the {TOTAL_DENARS}{GOLD_ICON} that we agreed upon.
The rest of your men rushed to your help, dragging you out to safety and driving the bandits back into hiding.
Bow Control
Your family were respected traders in an oasis town. They ran caravans across the desert, and were experts in the finer points of negotiating passage through the desert tribes' territories.
I don't wish to speak about that. As you know, our factions are at war.
Good, good. All the best to you, friend.
The {KINGDOM_NAME} was created in {CREATION_YEAR} by {RULER.NAME}, a rising {CULTURE_ADJECTIVE} warlord.
{VALUE} relationship with a random lord of your kingdom when an enemy lord is defeated.
{?PLAYER_CHILD}Your{?}The{\?} child quickly solves problems in {?CHILD.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} head, helping adults with their calculations.
Return to siege
trekking around nearby hills.
Choose an Achievement
I will miss this little deal we had. See you at the end
Capture the enemy.
{HERO.NAME} is traveling right now.
{VALUE}% daily chance to get +1 relation with a random notable in the governed settlement while a continous project is active.
I'll hunt down {TOTAL_COUNT} bands of brigands for you.
Polearm weapon speed: +{a0}%
Let us discuss the final terms of our marriage.
Make peace with the {KINGDOM_NAME}. Our kingdom will pay {T} tribute daily.

{QUEST_GIVER.LINK} asked you to sell {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} goods for at least {UNIT_PRICE}{GOLD_ICON} per load and return to {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}her{?}him{\?}. {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}She{?}He{\?} told you that any profit would make above this price is yours to keep.
You failed to complete tournaments in time. {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} will certainly be disappointed.
The {KINGDOM} will stop {POLICY_DESCRIPTION} ({POLICY}). {POLICY_SUPPORT}
All right, but if this falls through because you took too long, I won't be too happy with that.
Your clan/faction is now at war with {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}'s faction. Your agreement with {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} has been canceled.
Caught Illness

You must be the nice {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?} who {QUEST_GIVER.NAME} has been telling us about. We have been expecting you. The goods are nearby. I will tell my friends to bring them out as soon as you pay up.
Do you need mercenaries? I have a contract that I can transfer to you for {DEMAND_GOLD} denars.
Well, if they get wind of what you're up to, things could go very wrong for me.[ib:nervous2][if:convo_dismayed] Do be quick.
If you don't want to get involved in this yourself,[ib:closed][if:convo_grave] leave one of your capable companions and {NUMBER_OF_TROOPS} men for some days.
Gripped by wanderlust, {?PLAYER_CHILD}your{?}the{\?} child rode from the freezing woods of Sturgia to the blazing Nahasa.
'O'er the whale-road she sped \n She were manned by the dead \n And the clouds followed black in her wake'
{QUEST_GIVER.LINK} expects your return to have {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} share of the deal.
{ISSUE_OWNER.LINK} has captured {TARGET_HERO.LINK} {?ISSUE_OWNER.GENDER}herself{?}himself{\?}, your contract with {ISSUE_OWNER.LINK} has canceled.
type of item
Target party is currently in an army right now.
Village is successfully saved by your help.
{QUEST_GIVER.LINK} has died. Your quest is canceled.
While lacking experience a bit, you are full with youthful energy, you are fully eager, for the long years of adventuring ahead.
Good. I count on you.[if:convo_relaxed_happy]
{SETTLEMENT}{.o} rebels
{VALUE} battle morale against bandit parties.
And I will respect and cherish your family.
Palm Orchard
..and I will be at your side to fight your enemies should you need my sword.
led men into enemy territory.
It is not in my interest to change sides. (Self-interest persuasion failed.)
Faster building production +{a0}%
Actually, I changed my mind. Cancel the order...
Partners in Crime
The ruler has a monopoly on certain goods, although practically he can license out production to merchants and collect a portion of the proceeds.
Owner of {SETTLEMENT_NAME}
Peasant Leader
Seven Veterans
If you can advance to win the tournament, I'm sure that will do us both honor.[ib:hip2][if:convo_relaxed_happy]
Even the finest swordsman can perish if his lord is ignorant of the difference between necessary risks and reckless, unnecessary ones.

Your family numbered among the poor migrants living in the slums that grow up outside the walls of the river cities, making whatever money they could from a variety of odd jobs. Sometimes they did services for one of the region's many criminal gangs.
{ATTRIBUTE1} and {ATTRIBUTE2} are increased by {NUMBER_AP}.
A baron's retainers
Sorry, not interested.
I yield
{VALUE}% build speed to non-ranged siege engines.
Hairy {FIRSTNAME}
As your leader I am able to decide the best course of action.
My lord, may you give me another chance to prove myself?
{newline} • Army Gold Gain : {ARMY_GOLD_GAIN}
Request a parley
Good Natured
You are about to lose sight of the caravan. Find the caravan before they are in danger!
Thank you, my {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?}. Your companion will no doubt be very helpful.
{VALUE}% battle morale effect to friendly troops with your two handed kills.
{VALUE}% experience gain for companions.
Small Unit Tactics
Please don't kill us. We surrender.[rf:idle_angry][ib:nervous]
You have sold the mercenaries to another lord as you promised. {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} is grateful and sends {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} regards.
{FIRSTNAME} of the Harvest
{newline} • Notable Powers: {NOTABLE_POWER_LOST_AMOUNT}%
Yeah? What is it now?
50% less speed penalty and 15% sight range bonus in forests.
{VALUE}% recruitment cost of infantry.
Salt Mine
You have transferred the recruits to {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} as promised.
{VALUE} relationships with lords and ladies for succesful crafting orders.
Very well then. You catch some more and you want me to take them off of your hands, you know where to find me...
Is there anything else?[ib:normal]
{VALUE}% reload speed with crossbows.
I had not thought that I might marry a shieldmaiden. But it is intriguing. Tell me, have you killed men in battle?
Smugglers of {ORIGIN_SETTLEMENT}
Tell me about the details.
I have every reason to believe you'll reach round {ROUND_COUNT}.
{?CHILD.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} endurance.
Thank you for this information. It was {COMPANION_INQUIRY_COST} denars well spent.
Candidly, what do you think of your liege, {FIRST_NAME}?
We Pledge our Swords
10% production bonus to villages that are bound to castles.
Imposing Stature
{?PLAYER_CHILD}Your{?}The{\?} child helps out the local physician, binding and cleaning wounds and, when the master is absent, prescribing remedies.
Great Leader
I still think we may not be ready yet.
To craft a tactic one must first have an idea of what has worked in the past and what has failed, and any commander should know the course and outcome of as many battles as possible.
Traveling Rumors
{ISSUE_GIVER.NAME} offers you a deal to fix {TOURNAMENT_COUNT} tournaments and share the profit from the bet winnings.
You will have to fight us first![rf:idle_angry][ib:aggressive]
The {ENEMY_KINGDOM_INFORMAL_NAME} are willing to pay considerable tribute.
{FIRSTNAME} the Spider
The laws of {ISSUE_GIVER_SETTLEMENT} dictate that artisans sell their goods at a fixed rate to the merchants in town. And now they complain the price set by the merchants is not fair.
Even the most skilled swordsman or the strongest axe-wielder is to a lancer as the rabbit is to the eagle.
Well Strapped
Pay a {AMOUNT}{GOLD_ICON} bribe to go to the lord's hall.
{VALUE} experience to troops when a siege engine is built.
{VALUE} troop for the hideout crew
Thunderous Charge
{VALUE}% relationship gain with the same gender.
'My love is far \n I know not where \n Perhaps the winds shall tell me'
Forget it.
Donated prisoners exceed party capacity.
Slowhand {FIRSTNAME}
Your companion has protected the caravan that belongs to {ISSUE_GIVER.LINK} from {SETTLEMENT} as promised. {?ISSUE_GIVER.GENDER}She{?}He{\?} was happy with your work.

At {?CHILD.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} 14th birthday you gave {CHILD.NAME} a special present. You have seen {?CHILD.GENDER}her{?}him{\?} treasure it and believe it will shape who {?CHILD.GENDER}she{?}he{\?} is. You gave {?CHILD.GENDER}her{?}him{\?}...
The raid was ended by the battle outside of the village.
Most poachers would probably run if they were surprised by armed men. But these ones are bold and desperate.[ib:normal2][if:convo_undecided_closed] Be ready for a fight.
Items
{FIRSTNAME} the Beetle
Your {COMPANION.LINK} has delivered {ISSUE_GIVER.LINK}'s goods as you promised.
{FIRSTNAME} of the Covenant
Good to hear that! Safe journeys.
I will buy the products from you for {TOTAL_GOLD}{GOLD_ICON}. This way we both will get what we desire.
Most people would put a knife in your back for a few coppers. Have a few friends and keep them close, I guess.
Good to hear that
{FIRSTNAME} the Brewer
{VALUE}% siege attrition loss in the governed settlement.
{VALUE}% movement speed to parties called to your army.
Scout Perks
You have delivered the weapons to {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} as promised.
You have recruited the brigands into your party. {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} finds your solution acceptable and sends you the {GOLD_AMOUNT}{GOLD_ICON} as promised.

You refused his offer and decided to collect the rest of the revenues by force. Your action upset the village notables and made villagers angry. Some villagers tried to resist. In the brawl, {WOUNDED_COUNT} of your men got wounded.
This is for me.
Never mind. You can go.
This decision had the support of the council.
It'll be right up then, {?PLAYER.GENDER}ma'am{?}sir{\?}.
{ISSUE_GIVER.NAME} wants to sell you stolen goods. The price is low because of the added risk.
{FIRSTNAME} the {?COASTAL}Mariner{?}Horsetrader{\?}
Good. [if:convo_grave][ib:warrior2]That saves us all trouble.
Keen Sight
You have to bring in amount {REQUIRED_AMOUNT} more to fulfill your end of the deal.
The young {?CHILD.GENDER}woman{?}man{\?} learned to treat the mangled fingers and concussions without which no siege is complete.
{VALUE} melee weapon skills to troops in your party while in shield wall formation.
I know I can not force you to pay you what you owe me. But I think you will find that a good name is worth more than a few loads of {SELECTED_ITEM}...
{VALUE}% wages and upgrade costs of the mercenary troops in your party.

{ISSUE_GIVER.LINK}, a merchant of {QUEST_GIVER_SETTLEMENT}, told you that the poachers {?ISSUE_GIVER.GENDER}she{?}he{\?} hired are now out of control. You asked {COMPANION.LINK} to take {NEEDED_MEN_COUNT} of your men to go to {QUEST_VILLAGE} and kill the poachers. They should rejoin your party in {RETURN_DAYS} days.
enemy incursions

We need {GRAIN_AMOUNT} sacks of grain to meet our basic needs. And if you can find {LIVESTOCK_AMOUNT} live stocks and {WINE_AMOUNT} barrels of wine that would be a great favor. Men fight better after a good meal.
All the villages of {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} has been raided and your agreement with {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}her{?}him{\?} has been canceled.
I will try to earn your family's trust, then.
As you wish...[if:convo_normal]
{PERSON.LINK} won the tournament at {TOWN}.
{VALUE} recruitment level from rural notables.
{FIRSTNAME} the Rock
You have completed your end of the bargain. {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} now considers you as a trustworthy {?PLAYER.GENDER}tradeswoman{?}tradesman{\?}.
What we did back there, to that village... I don't do that. I want no part of it.
Before {CHILD.NAME} left, you encouraged {?CHILD.GENDER}her{?}him{\?} to...
Hideout was cleared by someone else. Your agreement with {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} is canceled.
Did you find what we needed, {?PLAYER.GENDER}madam{?}sir{\?}?
{VALUE}% battle morale to Tier 1 to 3 troops
You asked your best warrior to take {?CHILD.GENDER}her{?}him{\?} under his wings and make sure {?CHILD.GENDER}she{?}he{\?} gets the taste of battle without being seriously harmed.
Decisive Battle

When your community needed to organize a posse to pursue horse thieves, you were the obvious choice. You hunted down the raiders, surrounded them and forced their surrender, and took back your stolen property.
Aid Corps
A courier arrives from the {CLAN_NAME}. They hold {CAPTIVE_HERO.NAME} and are demanding {GOLD_AMOUNT}{GOLD_ICON} in ransom.
Making peace with the {KINGDOM_NAME}
Meaningful Favors
I gave an oath to my liege. To break it, even for a good reason, would be a great stain on my honor.
Halt. You're wanted by the authorities in {TARGET_SETTLEMENT} for smuggling.
My lady, may you give me another chance to prove myself?
{ISSUE_OWNER.LINK} and {TARGET_HERO.LINK} are now part of the same faction so they can't fight against each other. Your contract with {ISSUE_OWNER.LINK} has canceled.
As {?IS_FEMALE}queen{?}king{\?}, you must decide if war will be declared on the {KINGDOM_NAME}
Have you brought the animals {?PLAYER.GENDER}madam{?}sir{\?}?

{DEFAULT_TEXT}Before {?ARMY_LEADER.GENDER}she{?}he{\?} fell, {ARMY_LEADER.LINK} granted {?ARMY_LEADER.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} men their customary right of pillage after a successful siege. They may take property but must spare the townsfolk's lives.

Your family's clan never pledged its loyalty to the khan and never settled down, preferring to live out in the deep steppe away from his authority. They remain some of the finest trackers and scouts in the grasslands, as the ability to spot an enemy coming and move quickly is often all that protects their herds from their neighbors' predations.

You told your men to ignore the warning. Several hours after you left, some of your men started experiencing chills, then diarrhea. This does not appear to be a particularly virulent strain, as no one died, but about half your men are incapacitated.
Very well. This is a great step to take, but it must be done.[if:convo_calm_friendly][ib:confident]

I have little doubt you could find a market where you could get a better price than this, and make a profit.

Yes... As you know, the wars this realm has fought have been very costly. [if:convo_thinking][ib:closed2]The great lords in particular are hard-put to raise the armies that are key to this land's defense. Some of us have proposed increasing the hearth taxes paid by the peasantry, which is a key source of revenue. I don't know if this law will be approved, but rumors of it have gotten out in my district, and a lot of the farmers are restless. Now, most of us are doing their part to keep a lid on things. But there's one, {MALE_LESSER_NOBLE_NAME}, who I am ashamed to say was once a {TOP_TIER_CAV_TITLE} under my banner, who's been going around the countryside, stirring up trouble. He's gathered a following and they have a whole list of demands, including a ban on new taxes, that would frankly cripple our realm's ability to raise the money needed to defend itself. I'd take care of him myself, but that wouldn't look good. Maybe you can help?
{VALUE}% chance for dealing double damage to besieging troops in siege bombardment of the governed settlement.
Have you already sold that {SELECTED_ITEM}? If so, that seems awfully quick.
I just don't think that we would be happy together.

Not that I can think of. But if you don't want to do it, [if:convo_thinking]you can nominate someone from your party. It's not going to be easy, though. Whoever you name should be a good leader and have a good knowledge of tactics, and should take along at least {ALTERNATIVE_SOLUTION_NEEDED_MAN_COUNT} men. I'm ready to pay {REWARD}{GOLD_ICON} for your service. And if it comes to a fight, you can take whatever loot you want as spoils of war.

We do have some problems. [ib:demure][if:convo_dismayed] A sickness passed through here last month. Praise the Heavens, only a few people died, but many were weakened and we couldn't get much work done. Now we need to hire some laborers from nearby settlements to make up the shortfall, but we don't have the tools for them. We're in a bit of a rush - do you think you could find tools for us?

All towns had their share of projects that were constantly in need of both skilled and unskilled labor. You learned how hoists and scaffolds were constructed, how planks and stones were hewn and fitted, and other skills.

Ah, no. Slavers are rare these days. It used to be that, when the Empire and its neighbors made war upon each other, the defeated were usually taken as slaves. That helped pay for the war, you see! But today, for better or for worse, that is not practical. What with the frontiers broken and raiders crossing this way and that, there are far too many opportunities for captives to escape. But that does not mean that war cannot be profitable! Indeed it still can!
